amendment.description: To require coordination within the Department of Veterans Affairs to meet the readjustment and psychological counseling needs of veterans in rural and highly rural communities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3954 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3954 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2869; text: CR S2869) To require coordination within the Department of Veterans Affairs to meet the readjustment and psychological counseling needs of veterans in rural and highly rural communities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3954 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3954 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3896.
